tasks.instruction: Build a simple event check-in web app MVP with localStorage backend. Core features: 1. User registration form (name, email, phone) 2. Generate unique QR code on registration 3. QR scan via camera to auto-mark attendance 4. Organizer dashboard showing list of registered and present users. Use Shadcn-ui, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Keep UI fast, clean, and minimal with no extras.
